title: Patricia Breen Camille Pissarro Snow at Louveciennes Santa Ornament
description:
Ornament developed from Camille Pissarro’s Snow at Louveciennes, 1870, from the Art Institute of Chicago’s collection.

Exquisitely hand-painted and hand-silvered mouth blown glass ornament embodies the graceful and impressionist style of French painter Camille Pissarro. This limited edition piece created by artist Patricia Breen, shows the vivid imagery of a snow covered landscape on a crisp, cold winter day.  

  • Dimensions: 6 x 3.34 x 2.75 in.
  • Materials: Glass, Austrian crystals.
  • Hand painted, silvered.
  • Made in Poland

*Please note: Discounts and promotional pricing do not apply.
